item.title: Chapter 1 : Pirates
item.description: Lesson 1 Trace Ecrite : Pirates fiction vs. reality Introductory video : Vocabulary : Pirates chapter Activity : Pirate card game Lesson 2 Background to pirates Grammar : the preterit affirmation negation interrogative Lesson 3 PRESENT PAST SUBJECT + MIGHT + VERB SUBJECT + MIGHT HAVE + PP She might be English She might have gone to England She might speak English She might have learnt English at school She might be speaking She might have been speaking to her friend N.
